price: Wanda ya kasance yanã zaton cẽwa Allah bã zai taimake shi ba a cikin dũniya da Lãhira to sai ya mĩƙa wata igiya zuwa sama, sa'an nan kuma ya yanke ta, sa'an nan ya dũba. Shin, ko lalle kaidinsa zai gusar da abin da yake ji na takaici?
arabic: مَن كَانَ يَظُنُّ أَن لَّن يَنصُرَهُ ٱللَّهُ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ فَلۡيَمۡدُدۡ بِسَبَبٍ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ ثُمَّ لۡيَقۡطَعۡ فَلۡيَنظُرۡ هَلۡ يُذۡهِبَنَّ كَيۡدُهُۥ مَا يَغِيظُ
footnotes: * Wanda yake zaton Allah bã zai taimaki Annabinsa ba kuma yanã jin hushin Allah Ya zãɓi Muhammadu da Annabci, to, sai ya mutu da hushinsa,kuma ya yi dukan kaidin da yake so ya yi, Allah bã zai fãsa abin da Ya yi nufi ba a game da Annabinsa tsira da amincin Allah su tabbata a gare shi.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: man kāna yaẓunnu an lan yanṣurahu al-lahu fī al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati falyamdud bisababin ilā al-samāi thumma l'yaqṭaʿ falyanẓur hal yudh'hibanna kayduhu mā yaghīẓu
